name: Simulate template matches overlapping legacy and composable templates

headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-9.0.0-db63a281616c004b3e2e8fcb2f9bcd19f91c0337 "index template [v2_template] has index patterns [test*] matching patterns from existing older templates [v1_template] with patterns (v1_template => [test*, t1*]); this template [v2_template] will take precedence during new index creation"
